entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
